message: [SSH Alert] Multiple failed SSH login attempts detected from IP 192.168.1.250 to server X on port 22.
[Malware Alert] 'invoice_2025.pdf.exe' identified as Trojan.Generic on Host-22. Quarantined by antivirus.
[USB Alert] Unauthorized USB device connected to Host-34 at 3:04 AM. Device ID: WD12345.
[Phishing Alert] Suspicious email detected: Subject: 'Account Suspension Notice' sent to employee@company.com from login@secure-update.com
[DDoS Alert] Spike in traffic from 50+ IPs targeting api.company.com. Potential DDoS attack.
[Insider Alert] User 'j.doe' downloaded 15GB of sensitive files from internal HR system at midnight.
[DNS Alert] Repeated DNS lookups to suspicious domain c2-control.io from internal host 10.10.20.55.
[Cloud Alert] S3 bucket 'backup-data-prod' is publicly accessible and contains sensitive files.
[Privilege Alert] User 'intern_kim' was granted administrator rights on Domain Controller at 2:42 AM.
[Login Alert] Unusual login from Brazil to CFO's account 'cfo@company.com' using a new device.
